languages.text: "Какое вероломство! После всего, что Лорд-капитан сделал для Арбитес, Соломон пошел на предательство".
languages.translation_comment: Solomorne stood against the RT at the final showdown and was executed.

traits.locale_text: "Какое вероломство! После всего, что Лорд-капитан сделал для Арбитес, Соломон пошел на предательство".

languages.text: "The sheer duplicity! After everything the Lord Captain did for the Arbites, Solomorne still betrayed {mf|him|her}."
languages.translation_comment: Solomorne stood against the RT at the final showdown and was executed.
languages.original_text: "Какое вероломство! После всего, что Лорд-капитан сделал для Арбитес, Соломон пошел на предательство".

traits.locale_text: "The sheer duplicity! After everything the Lord Captain did for the Arbites, that Solomorne still betrayed {mf|him|her}."
"The sheer duplicity! After everything the Lord Captain did for the Arbites, that Solomorne still betrayed {mf|him|her}."
"The sheer duplicity! After everything the Lord Captain did for the Arbites, Solomorne still betrayed {mf|him|her}."

"The sheer duplicity! After everything the Lord Captain did for the Arbites, Solomorne still betrayed {mf|him|her}."
"The sheer duplicity! After everything the Lord Captain did for the Arbites, Solomorne still betrayed {mf|him|her}."

languages.text: 「なんという裏切りでしょう！ロード・キャプテンがあれほど高等裁定局のために尽くしておられたというのに、それでもソロモーンはあの方を裏切ったのか」
languages.original_text: "The sheer duplicity! After everything the Lord Captain did for the Arbites, Solomorne still betrayed {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: 「なんという裏切りでしょう！ロード・キャプテンがあれほど高等裁定局のために尽くしておられたというのに、それでもソロモーンはあの方を裏切ったのか」

languages.text: "Diese Doppelzüngigkeit! Nach allem, was der Lord Captain für die Arbites getan hat, hat Solomorne {mf|ihn|sie} dennoch verraten."
languages.original_text: "The sheer duplicity! After everything the Lord Captain did for the Arbites, Solomorne still betrayed {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Doppelzüngigkeit! Nach allem, was der Lord Captain für die Arbites getan hat, hat Solomorne {mf|ihn|sie} dennoch verraten."

languages.text: « Quelle perfidie ! Je n'arrive pas à croire que Solomorne ait osé trahir {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} après tout ce qu'{mf|il|elle} a fait pour l'Arbites. »
languages.original_text: "The sheer duplicity! After everything the Lord Captain did for the Arbites, Solomorne still betrayed {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle perfidie ! Je n'arrive pas à croire que Solomorne ait osé trahir {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} après tout ce qu'{mf|il|elle} a fait pour l'Arbites. »

languages.text: «¡Qué hipocresía! Después de todo lo que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ha hecho por el Arbites, Solomorne {mf|lo|la} traicionó igualmente».
languages.original_text: "The sheer duplicity! After everything the Lord Captain did for the Arbites, Solomorne still betrayed {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: «¡Qué hipocresía! Después de todo lo que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ha hecho por el Arbites, Solomorne {mf|lo|la} traicionó igualmente».

languages.text: “实在是太厚颜无耻了！领主舰长明明为法务部做了那么多事情，可索罗蒙还是背叛了{mf|他|她}。”
languages.original_text: "The sheer duplicity! After everything the Lord Captain did for the Arbites, Solomorne still betrayed {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: “实在是太厚颜无耻了！领主舰长明明为法务部做了那么多事情，可索罗蒙还是背叛了{mf|他|她}。”

languages.text: "Riyakârlığın bu kadarı! Lord Kaptan'ın Arbites için yaptığı onca şeye rağmen Solomorne hain çıktı."
languages.original_text: "The sheer duplicity! After everything the Lord Captain did for the Arbites, Solomorne still betrayed {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: "Riyakârlığın bu kadarı! Lord Kaptan'ın Arbites için yaptığı onca şeye rağmen Solomorne, hain çıktı."

languages.original_text: "The sheer duplicity! After everything the Lord Captain did for the Arbites, Solomorne still betrayed {mf|him|her}."
